HediffDef.label: opioid addiction
HediffDef.description: A chemical addiction to opioids of any kind. Long-term presence of opioids has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug. \nWithout regular doses of opioids, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction
